item.title: American Bitcoin, backed by Donald Trump's sons, begins trading on Nasdaq today. Here's all you need to know

review.headline_rewrite: American Bitcoin, backed by Donald Trump's sons, begins trading on Nasdaq today. Here's all you need to know
bullets: Eric Trump holds 9.3 per cent stake, while Hut 8 owns 80 per cent, as per a July securities filing, as per reports.

item.title: India lacks skilled manpower in chip sector, industry forced to hire overseas

review.headline_rewrite: India lacks skilled manpower in chip sector, industry forced to hire overseas
bullets: India’s chip ambitions have a massive hurdle in the extreme shortage of trained manpower in the semiconductor sector.
Industry leaders warn that without a deep pool of skilled workers, the country’s semiconductor ecosystem will take years to become workable.
In fact, there is such paucity of skilled workforce that the industry is having to hire from overseas.

item.title: Great Lakes Institute opens admissions for PGPM and PGPM-FBE programmes

review.headline_rewrite: Great Lakes Institute opens admissions for PGPM and PGPM-FBE programmes
bullets: + 409.83 + 135.45 -139.00 + 1,083.00 + 1,067.00 Chennai’s Great Lakes Institute of Management has opened admissions for its One-Year Post Graduate Programme
“We are excited to invite applications for the PGPM and PGPM-FBE for the academic year 2026–27.

Both programmes are designed for distinct yet equally ambitious segments of aspiring leaders—seasoned professionals aiming to accelerate their corporate journeys, and next-generation entrepreneurs seeking
